publicationStmt.p: Wellcome Library; Bibliotheca Alexandrina; King's College London

msContents.summary: 1 almanac in Arabic for year 1237 AH

msItem.title: Astronomical data tables for months of the year 1237 AH (1821-22 CE)
msItem.incipit: f.1r.1 زايرحة تحويل سنه العالم بافق مصر المحروسه باصول الغ بيك

history.provenance: Purchase note: Muḥammad ʿArām Ḥimṣī in Babylon (Coptic Cairo), 1249, f. 9r.
Manuscript was copied and purchased in Cairo.

revisionDesc.change: Updated record in accordance with Fihrist standards.
